entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending this afternoon then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near noon then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
